caption: A pilot was flying an airplane with a boy and a girl sitting behind. They rushed towards an elderly person and embraced each other. The pilot landed on a rooftop. Just then, a big cat appeared and tore their plane apart. Big Fur noticed these little people and pounced towards them. The big cat had a thorn stuck in its paw, and it wanted the boy to help remove it. The girl, the elderly person, and the pilot joined the big cat, and they found the boy. They all wrestled with the big cat and sat on its back. An elderly person instructed the boy to do some work on the floor.
